title: Saudi Arabia explains criteria for appointing non-Saudis as general managers
summary_full: Saudi Arabia's Qiwa platform has clarified a recent change. Non-Saudi nationals can still be appointed as general managers. This is permitted if the job title is officially recorded in the company's commercial registration. The change was procedural, not a policy shift. This ensures consistency between employment contracts and official business details.
